char_survivor_01.name: Emily Greenwood
char_survivor_01.intro: Daughter of a renowned botanist, raised in her father's greenhouse. She knows plant cycles and traits by heart and can easily pick the finest pumpkin seeds.

skill1.title: Green Thumb
skill1.desc: Seed find chance +30%; found seeds are higher quality; growth time −20%.

skill2.title: Nature Affinity
skill2.desc: When planting pumpkins in the greenhouse, the chance to trigger a Focus Check is reduced by 30%.

char_survivor_02.name: Thomas Hawthorne
char_survivor_02.intro: Son of a famed forest explorer. He inherited sharp senses for terrain and hidden clues, and rarely loses his way in the woods.

skill1.title: Eagle Eye
skill1.desc: Map vision radius +30%, and enemies within heartbeat range are highlighted on the map.

skill2.title: Tracker
skill2.desc: While tracking a jack-o’-lantern carrier or a monster, movement speed +15% and movement noise is reduced.

char_survivor_03.name: Lillian Noble
char_survivor_03.intro: Daughter of an antiquities scholar; she studies ancient rites and symbols. Lillian can read old altars and speed up their charging.

skill1.title: Antiquarian
skill1.desc: Altar charging speed +25%. After a successful Focus Check, 6% chance to trigger an Ancient Blessing that instantly completes the interaction.

skill2.title: Echoes of the Ancients
skill2.desc: Near an altar, map vision radius +20% and enemies within sight are highlighted.

char_survivor_04.name: Sebastian Mohr
char_survivor_04.intro: Son of a monster researcher. He understands monster patterns and weaknesses and can use special devices to buy precious time for teammates.

skill1.title: Conditioned Reflex
skill1.desc: When attacked by a monster, 20% chance to dodge. If the dodge fails, gain +20% movement speed for 10 seconds.

skill2.title: Potion Master
skill2.desc: Every 100 seconds, automatically drinks the next homemade elixir, cleansing all negative buffs.

char_overseer_01.name: Scarecrow
char_overseer_01.intro: An uncanny scarecrow that guards secrets in the dark and feeds on fear.

skill1.title: Terror Gaze
skill1.desc: Gazing at a target reduces their movement speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

skill2.title: Straw Rebirth
skill2.desc: Upon taking fatal damage, leaves a straw decoy at the spot and teleports to safety.
